channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the Veterans Day holiday will affect the stock and bond markets on Monday
S&P 500 again clears the 6,000 bar in Monday’s initial trades — live coverage
America solved veterans’ unemployment within a decade—but ‘underemployment’ continues to hold back their talents
item.description: With national unemployment rates at historically low levels, veteran unemployment is now even lower, dropping to 2.8% last month.

item.title: What to know about Susie Wiles, the Trump operative who will be the first woman to serve as White House chief of staff
item.description: The first woman to serve as White House chief of staff has a 40-year career in GOP politics.

item.title: Here’s how HR leaders can help employees prepare and recover from a hurricane
item.description: With climate change on the rise, employers need to implement policies and measures to provide for workers in their time of need.

item.title: Fate of postelection stock-market rally may be in the hands of bond traders
Working out at these times of day could reduce your risk of colorectal cancer by 11%, new study says
item.description: Study participants who were continuously physically active during the day also showed a lower risk of developing colorectal cancer.

item.title: The market has passed four key tests, says noted investment newsletter editor

item.description: The elitist Biden and Harris advisors bought into the false Trump economic narrative rather than confidently and clearly explain the actual economic f...

item.title: Earnings Watch: More companies are downbeat on Q4 — but estimates remain strong
